Message:
Our journey to crush
the demons and save the world
was going according to plan.

I mean, with the powerful bonds
that tied us together,
of course it was.

But, we also encountered
worlds that were beyond saving.

Demons were making witches
succumb to madness,
unleashing Curses that were
tearing these worlds apart.

And, in many worlds
lurked another enemy.

But, the mission given to us
by Lord Samyaza eventually
turned into a journey to
eliminate both the demons
and their acolytes.
